title: @Lyte Can you undo the permaban on my Main account?
body:
My maain Account (Fairy Tail 1) Was recently Permabanned and I would like to request that you undo the Perma ban.



You Said and I Quote "Let's put it this way... I'm more than happy to give players second chances if they are genuine about improving their behaviors. If people know what they did wrong and want to actually change, I want to empower that. Players that create negative experiences for thousands of players then wait until the final permanent ban tier to barely clean up... Sad panda Lyte."

and I sent you a message on Twitter and it said 

"I want to ask for a favor for you and see if you can help me. and for helping me I can either help you or make a deal with you in any way concerning my LoL Account. I will admit a few things for instance until recently I was one TOXIC M**** F***** and I realized how toxic I was when your system permanently banned my account. Now I will admit that before my account was permanently banned I did not think or notice how toxic I was being. The Moment that my League of Legends Account got permanently banned I feel sad, depressed, and very empty inside without my account. I never knew or understood how precious my League of Legends account was to me until I lost it. Now I want to make things right and fix/make amends for where I have made wrong. I am willing to do whatever it takes to get my League of Legends Account Back from your system, but do know this I see how your system works and it has in fact changed me, because on my alternate account I have not been cursing I have not been even talking much in game and I have been doing much better and I understand now how you system works in a way. Anyways I am sending you this Message, because I want my League of Legends Account back and was wondering if I vow to never be toxic again or do anything that can prove I have changed for the better would you be willing to undo the ban my banned account? I am willing to do whatever it takes to get the part of my life that I have now lost and this Account I spent over $7,000.00 on and I hope you can understand that this account is not precious to me because of how much I spent on it, but its about all the memories I have had with my account and how long I had it. Please Hear My Plea and undo the ban my account. and I will never ever be toxic again. I will literally do whatever it takes to get my league of legends account back."


Lyte I want you to read this, because I put my heart and soul into this message to convince you to undo my perma banned account and you never even read my message and I want you to read this and see if it is not from my heart and soul in this message, because I lost 6 years of my life on my account and I really wish you would give me another chance.

I do appreciate the message though, and the fact that you are doing better. If you want to play a game sometime, hit me up.

I also don't like advertising ban reasons to the entire community when the account owner has no idea what the cause is.

The Player Support Player Behavior team is the team that deals with requests dealing with suspensions. Riot Tantram works on the team that builds the systems, and in this post, didn't actually provide any information about the suspension other than the common knowledge policy that suspensions are not reversed.

There's currently a backlog in the Player Behavior queue, as happens after every ban wave. The PB team is working as fast as they can to get through all of the requests, so hang tight.

> It's not right of them

The punishment system is similar to punishment systems employed offline. And, very much like offline punishment systems, if you fuck up and get hit with a heavy punishment, you can't just apologise and then go back to the way things were before.

Like a car driver who gets his licence revoked for always breaking traffic rules, people who continuously break the rules of League of Legends won't get their accounts back by begging and apologising.

Punishments mean nothing if they can be so easily overturned.

Okay, but this isn't traffic, it's a video game. And you aren't permanently damaging any one else or costing anyone else money, or putting anyone else's life in danger. This would be the equivalent of getting banned for life from a pee wee baseball league for throwing a tantrum. I feel like perhaps permabans are a bit too harsh especially as 4th infraction in a system that punishes those who play more often.

4 months. That's been a while.

> This would be the equivalent of getting banned for life from a pee wee baseball league for throwing a tantrum.

This would pretty much be the equivalent of getting banned for life from a small baseball league after you've first been told to tone down your language and attitude, then told *again* that your conduct is impermissible, then forced to take a break from participating in the baseball league for unacceptable conduct and then *finally* being banned for life after showing repeatedly that your behaviour is beyond reconciliation and you have no concern nor respect for your fellow players.

If you pulled the toxic bullshit League players pull in an amateur baseball league, like telling your team mates to go kill themselves and that you fucked their mother, you would likewise be shown the door and be told that you are not welcome to play in the same court any longer.

First of all, you are only showing 1 game out of the 3 that you received. I guarantee you that this game alone is not why you are permabanned What about the other two games; were you toxic in those? If you were, then the ban was not made in mistake. Having 1 out of 3 games where you weren't toxic, while the system probably shouldn't have sent it to you as evidence, does not mean that the ban is not deserved.

Now, as for actually being permanently banned, you have had multiple other punishments (2 chat restrictions and a 14 day ban) before this one, which served as warnings to you that your behavior is unacceptable, and in the e-mail for your 14 day ban it states that your next punishment will be a permanent ban. If you haven't received any other punishments before this one, then either what you did was very extreme and Riot escalated you straight to a permanent ban, or possibly you're forgetting that you have had punishments in the past.
